Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions

Class Action

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions.Action
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActivateLeaderCard, ActivateProduction, AddResource, BuyCard, ChooseCardSlot, ChooseLeaderCard, ChooseProductionOutput, DevCardsCheat, DiscardLeaderCard, EndMarket, EndTurn, FaithTrackCheat, InitChooseLeaderCards, InitChooseResources, LeaderCardsCheat, MarketChooseRow, PayResource, ResetWarehouse, StrongboxCheat, SwitchDepot, VictoryPointsCheat
public class Action
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Action Class defines common Data and Methods to perform an action on the model after a Client's request.

An Action subclass type object is created by the Client and sent to the Server to be processed.

Attributes:

  • String "nickname": name of the player who performed the action
  • ActionType "actionType": enum indicating the Action requested
  • String "response": contains the Controller's response after trying to perform the action
  • String "ILLEGAL_ACTION": standard message to be used when a player cannot perform a certain type of Action
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • isCorrect

      public boolean isCorrect()
      Checks if the Action subclass parameters are correct and can be used by the Model's Classes to perform the given action.
      Returns:
      true if parameters are correct.

    • canBeApplied

      public boolean canBeApplied​(ActionController actionController)
      Checks if the request is logically applicable by the Model.
      Parameters:
      actionController - Class used to compute Action messages coming from the Client.
      Returns:
      true if the action can be applied by the Model with the given parameters.

    • canDoAction

      public boolean canDoAction​(ActionController actionController)
      Checks if the action requested can be performed by the player by assuring that the List of Possible Actions in the Model's Player contains the ActionType describing the Action coming from the Client.
      Parameters:
      actionController - Class used to compute Action messages coming from the Client.
      Returns:
      true if the action can be performed.

    • doAction

      public java.lang.String doAction​(ActionController actionController) throws java.lang.Exception
      Computes the request sent by the client using Model's methods.
      Parameters:
      actionController - Class used to compute Action messages coming from the Client.
      Returns:
      A String to be used later to create a message to send to the Client.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • messagePrepare

      public MessageToClient messagePrepare​(ActionController actionController)
      Prepares a message to be sent to the Client after a certain request. Each Action SubClass creates a different MessageToClient-Object to be later serialized and sent.
      Parameters:
      actionController - Class used to compute Action messages coming from the Client.
      Returns:
      A MessageToClient subclass containing all information needed to update the client's Reduced Model.

    • illegalAction

      public MessageToClient illegalAction​(MessageToClient message, ActionController actionController)
      Edits a MessageToClient in case the player tried to perform an Action he could not have performed at a certain time.
      Parameters:
      message - MessageToClient to edit.
      actionController - Class used to compute Action messages coming from the Client.
      Returns:
      The edited MessageToClient object.

    • cheatMessage

      protected CheatMessage cheatMessage​(ActionController actionController)
      Common method used by Cheat Actions to generate a new CheatMessage.
      Parameters:
      actionController - Class used to compute Action messages coming from the Client.
      Returns:
      A new CheatMessage.
